OmniBTC.description: OmniBTC is a decentralized cross-chain bridge and lending platform, aiming to connect and unify all the on-chain liquidity.
OmniBTC.content: OmniBTC is the ultimate cross-chain bridge and lending platform that unifies all on-chain liquidity using interoperability protocols such as LayerZero, Wormhole, and Celer Network, etc. Allowing users to bridge and lend any token on any chain without interacting with multiple protocols, DEX, and bridges.

Lync.description: Web3 gaming layer that helps you to build blockchain games in minutes than months
Lync.content: LYNC is a Leading Multi-chain Gaming Ecosystem Providing Key Infrastructure to Tier 1 Gaming Studios & Indie Developers

Razor Wallet.description: Razor Wallet: Your Sleek Companion on Movement
Razor Wallet.content: Building Native Solutions for DeFi and Infrastructure on Movementlabsxyz.

Lexer Market.content: Decentralized perpetual exchange for Forex, Crypto, NFT & more.

Nightly Connect.description: Wallet Adapter & Set of ready-to-use tools for building mobile dApps
Nightly Connect.content: Nightly Connect is a permissionless, open-source solution that serves as both a wallet adapter and a set of ready-to-use tools for building dApps, enabling connections through QR codes or deep links. Nightly Connect provides solutions to both wallets and dApps. It not only enables easier connections to extension and mobile dApps, but also integrates wallets into dApps.

Hyperlane.description: Connecting modular expansion with permissionless interop ⏩
Hyperlane.content: Hyperlane is the first interoperability layer that enables you to permissionlessly connect any blockchain, out-of-the-box.

IDOswap.description: DeFi's platform offers personalized commissions, token creation, betting rewards and more.
IDOswap.content: IDOswap is revolutionizing DeFi trading on the Movement Labs blockchain. By seamlessly integrating concentrated liquidity pools into its advanced wallet solution, IDOswap empowers users with personalized fees, token creation capabilities, and rewarding staking opportunities. Explore permissionless pools for superior volume, higher APR and minimal slippage. Choose concentrated liquidity pools for reduced slippage and flexible fees. Participate in staking to earn rewards and increase liquidity.

Flex Protocol.description: The First Liquidity DEX in Move Ecosystem, supporting Games and Fully-on-chain Game.
Flex Protocol.content: Flex offers a unique mechanism for trading NFTs and SFTs via AMM, enabling immediate swaps of diversified portfolios. Its portfolio swap feature allows for efficient trading of gaming assets and characters within the Move ecosystem. Additionally, Flex provides a DEX as a Service (DaaS) via API, allowing for perpetual contracts on various assets, including gaming assets and memes.

Desig.content: Experience the first Omnichain Smart Multisig wallet that streamlines treasury ops. Watch your funds flourish with intuitive tracking, smart allocation & insightful cashflow reports.

Baptswap.description: Baptswap is a Decentralized Exchange (DEX) bringing support for fee-on-transfer solutions within a MOVE-based blockchain environment.
Baptswap.content: Baptswap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) operating on the Aptos Network, enabling peer-to-peer cryptocurrency exchanges without the need for trusted intermediaries. Baptswap it the first DEX to introduce the fee-on-transfer model to Aptos, enabling teams to apply a fee on each transfer of their token. These fees can be allocated towards various purposes based on each individual team's needs and financial model. Baptswap uses an automated market maker (AMM) model, where users can trade against a liquidity pool of two assets, rather than an order book of buy and sell orders. Liquidity providers can earn fees by depositing their tokens into the pool, and traders can swap any token pair supported by the protocol. Baptswap handles the price calculations and slippage adjustments automatically, making trading fast and simple. Baptswap is leveraging the advantages of the Aptos Network and the MOVE language, through a user-friendly and innovative DEX experience for the DeFi users on Aptos.

MovementSwap.description: A testnet Aptos and Sui protocol for Movement
MovementSwap.content: Movementswap is a decentralized exchange on the Movement Network, designed for trading generic digital assets. It allows users to swap between different types of Coins, provide liquidity to earn rewards, and participate in incentivized liquidity. Movementswap is built to be fast and user-friendly, aiming to provide a smooth trading experience.

Interest Protocol.content: Swap, provide liquidity, create coins, airdrop or build on top of Interest Protocol using hooks.

Gilder.description: Web3 community platform for Gamers, Anime Fans, and more which offer forums, chat,and gaming tools.
Gilder.content: Gilder is the place to find the latest gaming news, announcements and analysis. Unlock your gaming potential

Pyth.description: The Pyth network is a first-party financial oracle network designed to provide low-latency real-world data to multiple blockchains in a secure and transparent manner.
Pyth.content: Pyth delivers real-time market data for crypto, equities, FX, and commodities. Major financial institutions—including some of the world's biggest exchanges, market makers, and trading firms—publish their data directly to the network. Supercharge your application by accessing the most accurate, lowest-latency, and highest-resolution data directly from these first-party sources on Pyth.

Supra Oracles.description: Supra is a decentralized cross-chain oracle solution.
Supra Oracles.content: Supercharging Web3 for a better, decentralized future. Web3 needs faster, more secure, more decentralized blockchain infrastructure. That's what we're building. With 5+ years of R&D and a series of technical breakthroughs, we're building native cross-chain solutions to help your smart contracts and blockchain apps work better. We're not bragging. We just build better.

GoGoPool.description: Subnets Made Easy. Launch a validator node or stake AVAX instantly.
GoGoPool.content: Participate in AVAX staking rewards with GoGoPool. Stake your AVAX assets to get ggAVAX, earn rewards, and contribute to the growth of the first decentralized staking protocol on Avalanche. Earn more than validating solo. Stake GGP, get matched with AVAX, and launch your node with a Minipool. Use your GGP rewards to gain AVAX delegations.

Gorillaz.description: The most epic gorilla community on Movement.
Gorillaz.content: Gorilla moverz is an epic community of gorillas on Movement, and together WAGMI.

Avalanche.description: Build anything you want, any way you want on the lightning fast, scalable blockchain that wont let you down.
Avalanche.content: Avalanche is the future-proof blockchain built to scale. Build any thing you want, any way you want on the most developer-friendly Layer 1

Near.description: Delivering on the promises of Web3, with Chain Abstraction.
Near.content: NEAR is the chain abstraction stack, empowering builders to create apps that scale to billions of users and across all blockchains.

Celestia.content: Celestia is a modular data availability network that makes it easy for anyone to securely launch their own blockchain.

Avail.content: Avail is a Web3 infrastructure layer that allows modular execution layers to scale and interoperate in a trust minimized way.

Benqi.description: Seamless staking and lending for Avalanche
Benqi.content: BENQI is a suite of decentralized finance protocols built on Avalanche. It consists of the BENQI Markets, BENQI Liquid Staking and Ignite.

IDOwallet.description: DeFi on Movement Labs blockchain with replayable transactions, swaps, stakes, portfolio, incentives.
IDOwallet.content: IDOwallet is an advanced decentralized finance (DeFi) solution built on the Movement Labs blockchain. It provides users with a range of features including replayable transactions, optimized swaps, token creation capabilities, a staking marketplace, a portfolio management dashboard, an airdrop claim interface, and a built-in incentive program. These features are designed to provide users with a seamless and rewarding experience within the DeFi ecosystem.

Seam Money.description: Concentrated Liquidity AMM on aptos and movementlabsxyz
Seam Money.content: We believe the future of DeFi is composability across pools, protocols, and chains. With Seam Money you can permissionlessly create custom vaults to hedge all your DeFi positions in one place.

Zokyo.description: Protect your innovations and investments by partnering with a Web3 cybersecurity leader
Zokyo.content: Web3 cybersecurity demands a multi-pronged approach. We take an adversary-focused approach to identify complex vulnerabilities before you move your blockchain project into production or onto the mainnet.

Mintify.description: The NFT Orderbook: A Fast Interface and Execution Engine For NFT Trading
Mintify.content: Pushing the boundaries of Blockchain and NFT tech. We're committed to building innovative products and unique trading experiences for all NFT Economies of the future.

Ultiverse.description: Crafting AI-driven gaming worlds beyond imagination with VR and NFTs
Ultiverse.content: Ultiverse is an integrated Web3 platform combining GameFi, NFTs, DeFi, Marketplace, and Liquid Staking. Ultiverse aims at building the next-generation entrance connecting Web3 with players all around the world.

Leap Wallet.description: this wallet is ready for cosmos
Leap Wallet.content: Leap is the all-in-one super wallet for Cosmos, offering in-wallet transfers, staking, swaps, dApp browser, and more. Supports 50+ Cosmos chains & trusted by 300k+ cosmonauts.

Crust.description: Complete Your Web3 Journey with Decentralized Storage
Crust.content: Empowering Data Through Decentralization With decentralization at its core Crust Network is a purpose built layer 1 blockchain providing composable cloud storage solutions for developers, builders and end-users of all ecosystems.

Kado.description: The easiest way to buy, sell or swap crypto.
Kado.content: Onboard to Web3 in 5 minutes. Buy and sell cryptocurrency instantly with Kado using your card or bank transfer

Noble.description: The new standard for digital asset issuance
Noble.content: Noble is changing how stablecoins and other real world assets are issued on blockchains by combining minimalistic, high security architecture with the cross-chain efficiencies of the IBC protocol.

Union.content: A hyper-efficient zero-knowledge infrastructure layer for general message passing, asset transfers, NFTs, and DeFi.

Cedro.description: Lend and Borrow across multiple chains
Cedro.content: Cedro Finance is a cross-chain decentralized liquidity protocol where users can lend and borrow the listed assets. Lenders are able to deposit their assets to contribute to the liquidity of the platform and borrowers are able to borrow the liquidity in an overcollateralized manner.

Skip Protocol.content: Skip helps sovereign blockchain protocols supercharge their user experience, interoperability, and value capture with its vertically integrated product suite.

Cosmostation.content: Skip helps sovereign blockchain protocols supercharge their user experience, interoperability, and value capture with its vertically integrated product suite.

Milky Way.description: Unlock Your Assets With Modular Liquid Staking
Milky Way.content: MilkyWay is a liquid staking protocol tailor-made for Celestia's modular ecosystem.

Tailwind.description: PICK A TOKEN, PAY GAS ANYWHERE
Tailwind.content: NAVIGATING 50+ COSMOS AND EVM CHAINS HAS NEVER BEEN SO EASY.

Omni Network.description: The blockchain built to unite all rollups.
Omni Network.content: Omni unifies Ethereum’s fragmented layer 2 ecosystem by establishing a low latency and high throughput global messaging network for all rollups.

Stakestone.content: STONE is the best yield-bearing ETH with a decentralized yield optimizing service ready for mass adoption on layer2s.

Hyacinth.description: Find the perfect audit solution for your protocol.
Hyacinth.content: As the first decentralized auditing platform with on-chain validation, Hyacinth is the ideal solution for any protocol looking to improve their security. Protocols of any size and budget can find their perfect audit solution.

Gaimin.description: World biggest source of decentralized GPUs, powering AI tech, fueled by 350k+ gamers!
Gaimin.content: GAIMIN is a Web3 gaming infrastructure project strategically positioned at the disruptive intersection of Web3, gaming, and cloud computing.

Monoswap.description: A testnet EVM protocol for Movement MEVM
Monoswap.content: Monoswap is an EVM-based DEX on the Movement Network. It features a classic AMM and concentrated liquidity — users can choose to provide funds in specific price ranges to earn more from their investments. Monoswap is geared towards offering efficient and profitable trading opportunities.

Ethena.content: Ethena is a synthetic dollar protocol built on Ethereum that will provide a crypto-native solution for money not reliant on traditional banking system infrastructure, alongside a globally accessible dollar denominated savings instrument - the 'Internet Bond'.

Covalent.description: Blockchain data for the new economy
Covalent.content: Covalent is a single, unified API for fast, scalable historical blockchain data.

Stride Zone.description: Stake it here, Take it anywhere.
Stride Zone.content: Stake your tokens on Stride from any Cosmos chain. See your rewards accumulate in real time.

Aptos Move.description: Aptos is the layer 1 blockchain engineered to evolve.⁣
Aptos Move.content: Aptos is the blockchain network with everything you need to build your big idea. Lets Move.

Dappad+.description: Dappad is a connective link that bridges the gap between Layer2 projects and early investors as a multichain launchpad.
Dappad+.content: Dappad is a connective link that bridges the gap between Layer2 projects and early investors as a multichain launchpad. Dappad offers a technological infrastructure to challenge the traditional ways of the launchpad industry, offering easy onboarding with Account Abstraction and the ability to use native tokens as gas fees with the Paymaster model.

Thala.description: DeFi HyperApp and Liquidity Engine – powered by Move⁣
Thala.content: Thala enables seamless borrowing of Move dollar and efficient liquidity provisioning

Echelon.description: Composable, Efficient & Secure Move Money Market⁣
Echelon.content: Echelon is a decentralized financial market written in the Move programming language. Its users can borrow and lend assets to each other indirectly via non-custodial pools to earn interest or increase one's buying power with leverage.

ShogunFi.content: Inspired by the shōgun's unification of Japan, the Shogun Network will unveil a revolutionary approach to cross-chain liquidity, reshaping fragmented marketplaces in ways yet unseen.

Yodeswap.description: Original meme DEX on Dogechain, coming soon to Movementlabsxyz

Ngmi.description: NGMI will be the first ever rollup to launch on Move VM - going live in 2024

Firewall.content: Firewall builds a safe sequencer that leverages machine learning and pattern recognition to defend rollups from smart contract exploits.

Infinite Seas.description: We are crafting a maritime trading & battle-focused onchain game, inspired by Uncharted Waters IV.
Infinite Seas.content: Infinite Seas Studios is crafting a fully on-chain maritime trading and diplomatic social game on Move L2. Here, victors claim the stakes of the vanquished as the game rolls on. Our aim is to experiment with the extent to which a game can foster microtransactions and player-to-player trading, all powered by our AMM infrastructure and backend engine.

Zion Bets.content: Welcome to Zion Bets — a game designed to give you a taste of fast bets and live gambling, deployed natively on-chain to the Movement network, secured by Move.

Movecity.description: The Social dApp to own onchain moment on Movement
Movecity.content: The Social dApp to own onchain moment on Movement

Route-X.description: a comprehensive defil solution on Movement
Route-X.content: Route-X is the first ultimate aggregator on Movement, with designed to optimize liquidity and enhance trading efficiency. By integrating all the Swaps and Clob-X CLOB system, Route-X ensures that traders access the best available prices with minimal slippage.

BlockVision.description: BlockVision offers blockchain infrastructure, specializing in RPC nodes, APIs, and explorers.
BlockVision.content: BlockVision delivers next-gen blockchain infrastructure solutions, specializing in RPC nodes, indexing APIs, and explorer development. Supporting both EVM and Move chains, we enhance blockchain experiences with our advanced tools. Our explorers offer comprehensive data analysis and user-friendly interfaces, simplifying blockchain navigation for developers and users. With our cutting-edge infrastructure and expertise, we are equipped to support a wide range of projects across various chains.

Versatus.content: Versatus is the Decentralized Cloud built on top of Eigenlayer for Unstoppable Applications enabling developers to launch, manage and scale censorship resistant, verifiable virtual private servers (VPS) & containers, and host web & mobile applications.

Saga.description: Infinite horizontal scalability. Launching the next 1000 chains in the Multiverse.
Saga.content: Saga gives visionaries an Integrated Stack of high-end tools and support they need to turn their Web3 dreams into reality. Saga is a Layer-1 protocol that allows developers to automatically spin up parallelized, VM-agnostic, and interoperable dedicated chains, or “Chainlets,” that provide applications with infinite horizontal scalability.

Nightly Wallet.content: Nightly is a multichain crypto wallet, available on blockchains such as Movement, Aptos, Sui, Solana, NEAR, Aleph Zero, Polkadot, and Vara. It is designed for both desktop and mobile users, available as a browser extension compatible with Chrome, Firefox, Brave, and Edge, as well as a mobile application for Android and iOS platforms.

Search on Dora.description: Dora is the Unified Search Engine for the Multichain World
Search on Dora.content: We believe that as applications leverage online and onchain infrastructure, unlocking search drives understandability. Embedding interactivity at the Discoverability Layer catalyzes mass adoption.  We are dedicated to enhancing the accessibility of on-chain data through innovative search capabilities. We collaborate with a multitude of blockchain networks and rollup teams to empower them with our comprehensive block explorer and search solutions.  We can best support chains with our:  • Natively multichain block explorer • Token/NFT APIs • Indexed data subgraphs • Bridge Aggregator/Swap/Mint  • Embedded Wallets

Hemera.description: Hemera Protocol is a decentralized, omni-chain covering, modular indexing protocol powering open AI innovation.
Hemera.content: We offer blockchain explorer services distinguished by exceptional performance, scalability, and cost efficiency—up to 2 orders of magnitude cheaper than alternatives. - AI-augmented UX for retail users Already trusted by leading L1 & L2’s Taiko, Linea, Manta Network, Story Protocol, Mantle Network, ZetaChain, Cyber, Polygon etc. You can refer to the following live explorers for key features listed above. We also welcome any additional feature request you want to have in the explorer. - https://manta.socialscan.io/ - https://linea.socialscan.io/ - https://mantle.socialscan.io/

SecurFi.description: Trustless security layer for onchain ecosystem
SecurFi.content: SecurFi uses cryptography to secure onchain contracts.   SecurFi offers a more accurate and quantitative safety indicator for users through the on-chain bounty.  When users interact with the smart contract, they only need to check the bounty size to assess its security.

Multichainz.description: DeFi's Most Versatile and Futuristic Lending Platform
Multichainz.content: Multichainz is a groundbreaking cross-chain lending protocol that allows users to borrow against any type of blockchain asset, including cryptocurrencies, StakedETH, NFTs, and RWAs. Multichainz also places lending and borrowing versatility at its core through enabling an automated cross-chain mechanism and providing a tailored platform for institutional users to transact with extra safe security measures, such as on-chain verification (KYC), institutional grade asset custody, and a verifiable trusted network of counterparties.

Avitus.description: Open and permissionless derivative protocol boosting DeFi TVL. Allowing any asset to be used as collateral and to provide liquidity.
Avitus.content: Avitus is an open and permissionless derivatives protocol purpose-built on Movement Labs to boost DeFi TVL by unlocking new cases: allow any asset to create a perp market or launch their own perp market. Official link: https://linktr.ee/avitusxyz  Features: Avitus, is a novel perpetual futures infrastructure protocol:  - allows any asset to be used as collateral (LSTs, NFTs, ERC20, etc). - enables creation & launch of perpetual futures market with ease. - unlocks deep liquidity for perpetual futures with ever-growing list of assets. - allows multiple market designs based on requirements of market creator. - engineered to adapt to new trends or hypothesis. - built from ground-up to democratize perpetual futures markets. - offers perpetual futures and swap markets by default. - created with above-industry standard risk management mechanisms. - powered by robust tamper-proof, fault-proof & outlier proof hybrid oracle delivered by combination of on-chain & real-world sources. - adapts a hybrid funding mechanism to maintain sustainability of markets. - provides non-custodian trade execution to end-users. - easily deployable across different chains. - scale DeFi with massive liquidity and unlimited listings towards more liquid futures.  Avitus differentiates itself all from other perp DEXes in the sense that it is community-driven and users are in control similar to how Uniswap works. This allows:  1. Anyone to launch their own perpetual futures market of their own token (benefical to the project tokens to attract traders) and/or  2. Anyone to launch perpetual futures market using their own tokens (benefits the ecosystem as it increase token utility for all tokens in the ecosystem)

VCRED.content: VCRED aims to be the AI liquidity layer for  all perp exchanges. Our agents provide access to complex market-making strategies which provide unique yield exposure to users. We are live with Hyperliquidx on Arbitrum , BSX on Base, generating 2M USD daily volume. We are  partnered with Ritual on the platform side.

LayerBank.content: LayerBank stands as a state-of-the-art, permissionless, non-custodial DeFi lending platform, offering a stable crypto money market service across the omni-chain environment.

Softstack.description: Your Web3 Service Partner for Software Development, Cybersecurity and Consulting.
Softstack.content: We are softstack (formerly known as Chainsulting), Your Web3 Service Partner, Big enough to be the industry leader. Small enough to know you by name. Not a faceless, profit-driven company. With softstack, you get a partner who cares about your growth.
